thread.title: 'Shoeless' Paire stuns Nishikori to reach Tokyo final - The Peninsula
thread.title_full: 'Shoeless' Paire stuns Nishikori to reach Tokyo final - The Peninsula - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The Peninsula
title: 'Shoeless' Paire stuns Nishikori to reach Tokyo final - The Peninsula
text:
Benoit Paire of France returns the ball to Japan's Kei Nishikori during their men's singles semi-final tennis match at the Japan Open championships in Tokyo. TOKYO: Lightning struck twice for Kei Nishikori as the defending Japan Open champion was ambushed by "shoeless" Frenchman Benoit Paire in an explosive semi-final on Saturday.
 The Peninsula.
